name: Overleap
description:
Overleap is a 3D Action Platformer with Rougelike Elements


FIGHT
Fight your way through crazy monsters and splash colour into the dark world of Overleap while you explore a cruel and yet beautiful world.

–

JUMP
Roam on hidden paths and overcome tricky platformer challenges on your way into the deepest abyss.
Don't fall down, it hurts...

–

GROW STRONGER
Find powerful items as a reward for your effort and hidden along your way. You failed? Don't worry, your friends at the base got you covered with upgrades for your gear and path, although they charge a certain price for it.

 

CARSTEN GEDRAT
Programming

   

ALBERT BEDNARSKI
Concept Art, Character Art

   

MAX FREYTAG
Environment Art

   

Music by Punch Deck
